person.persName: John C. Applegate (Nelson County, Kentucky, coach painter and soldier CSA)

body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, coach painter and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of John H. Applegate and Martha J. Applegate. Coach painter in Nelson County in 1860. Served in the 9th Kentucky Volunteer Mounted Infantry Regiment (C.S.A.) as fourth sergeant from December 31, 1861 to October 18, 1862, as a private from October 18, 1862, to June 30, 1863, and as a second lieutenant from June 30, 1863, to May 6, 1865. Surrendered at Washington, Georgia, on May 6, 1865. Signed an oath of allegiance to the United States on May 18, 1865.
